definitions.definition: a building in which dead bodies are kept before they are buried or cremated (= burned)

examples.text: They found his body lying in the city morgue.
This place is like a morgue!

definitions.definition: a place where dead bodies that have been found are kept until they can be identified

wordOrigin: early 19th cent.: from French, originally the name of a building in Paris where bodies were kept until identified.
